description: If you like your cookies soft, chewy and full of chocolate, try this oat chocolate chip cookies recipe. It'll only take you 20 minutes.
name: Best Oat Chocolate Chip Cookies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.75 cup firmly packed dark brown sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle sea salt over cookies, then allow to cool completely on trays before serving.
